Package feedbackpkg

Interface iFeedbackStaff

All Known Implementing Classes:
FeedbackManager
public interface iFeedbackStaff
Interface for feedback operations specific to a staff member.

  • Method Details

    • getCampEnquiries

      ArrayList<String> getCampEnquiries(ArrayList<String> regCampList)
      Retrieves a list of enquiries related to the camps that the user is overseeing.
      Parameters:
      regCampList - A list of camp IDs(Names) that the user is registered for.
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries related to the camps that the user is overseeing.

    • replyEnquiry

      void replyEnquiry(int feedbackID, ArrayList<String> regCampList, String replyContent) throws Exception
      Replies to an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - The ID of the enquiry to reply to.
      regCampList - A list of camp IDs(Names) that the user is registered for.
      replyContent - The content of the reply.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while replying to the enquiry.

    • getCampSuggestions

      ArrayList<String> getCampSuggestions(String campID)
      Retrieves a list of suggestions for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID(Name) of the camp.
      Returns:
      A list of suggestions for the specified camp.

    • approveSuggestion

      void approveSuggestion(int feedbackID)
      Approves a suggestion.
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - The ID of the suggestion to approve.
